Package com.telran.pizzaservice.service

Class PizzaServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.telran.pizzaservice.service.PizzaServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PizzaService
@Service public class PizzaServiceImpl extends Object implements PizzaService
Implementation of the PizzaService interface that uses the PizzaRepository to

perform CRUD operations on Pizza entities.

Author:
Elena Ivanishcheva
